group.name: Brussels Arigato Zen Meditation by Dr Soho Machida

description:
"Arigato Zen" (arigato: thank you in Japanese) is an easy & simple voice-meditation which Dr. Soho MACHIDA developed based on his 20-yrs. Zen training and scholarship as a specialist of comparative religion. By performing the "Arigato Zen", one is able to remove themselves of negative memories within one’s own sub-consciousness, which lie at the root of all problematic phenomena. By achieving clarity of the sub-consciousness, one is able to live with a sense of vast fulfilment and joyfulness.
With his motto, "through physical practices, you can experience real mental change", Dr. Soho invented this revolutionary method of meditation that transcends religion and ethnicity. It consists of four pillars:
1."Arigato Breathing"
2."Kannon (bodhisattva) Zen"
3."Kansha (gratitude) Nembutsu"
4."Nehan (nirvana) Zen"

PROGRAM(CLASS): 60min Lecture (slide presentation)60min Arigatou Zen Meditation Workshop60min Experience Sharingfollowed by drink & snack with Dr Soho Machida(Option) 
Program lasts for about 3 hours. 1 am-session + 1 pm-session per day, all sessions cover the same content. You can attend a class or classes for any combination, lecture &/or workshop according to your scuedule and convinience. Pls consult in advance.

DATE : Tue 28th & Wed 29th Oct 2014 / 1 am-class + 1 pm-class every day
TIME: am-class 10h00am - 13h00pm Japanese / pm-class 19h00pm - 22h00pm English LUNGUAGE: Professor machida is native in Japanese and fluent in Englishcurrently am session is scheduled for Japanese audience, and evening for EnglishPls consult in advance for translation requirements.


[PARTICIPATION FEES]
Lecture & Workshop：35€ p.p.Lecture Only : 20€ p.p.
Workshop Only : 20€ p.p. Workshop for 2nd time + : 15€ p.p. each workshop(covers experience sharing)Drink & Snack：15€ p.p.

VENUE: 46 rue de Spa, 1000 Brussels, Belgium
RESERVATION: email to [masked]
ENG & JPN Website => http://www.arigatozen.com/
FR & ENG Website => http://sohozen.canalblog.com/
name: Let's meet and practice Arigato Zen Meditation!
